snippet.title: N.O.V.A. Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance - iPhone/iPod touch Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on the App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/n-o-v-a-near-orbit-vanguard-alliance/id343596730?mt=8

Best Action Game of the Year by IGN
 http://www.near-orbit-vanguard-alliance.com and http://twitter.com/NOVA_fps
Gameplay trailer of the highly-anticipated sci-fi FPS

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
